document.full_text: pakistan prime minister yusuf raza gilani rejected allegations on monday that the killing of osama bin laden near islamabad by u.s. forces showed pakistani incompetence or complicity in hiding the al qaeda leader.
document.title: pakistan pm rejects accusations over bin laden
lines_and_colors: pakistan prime minister yusuf raza gilani rejected allegations on monday that the killing of osama bin laden near islamabad by u.s. forces showed pakistani incompetence or complicity in hiding the al qaeda leader.
